page.title: 11HEALTH IN SEASCALE/GOSFORTH
page.content:
I go to the opticians every year to have my eyes tested.The optician who tests your eyes takes you into the medical room and tells you to sit down.He takes your name,your address and your date of birth.The doctor puts some lenses over your eyes to see which lenses you need in your glasses. After that the optician tells you to read some letters on a piece of card. Then you can go and pick the frames you like best for your glasses.A few weeks later the optician rings you up and tells you to come and collect your glasses.
I suddenly broke my finger while catching a ball.First I went to Seascale surgery where the doctor told me I had torn my finger muscle.Then he told me I had broken my finger.So I was rushed off to Whitehaven Hospital
